name: plcqtlib
short_description:
Added class for management 0BA7 Siemens logo
Fixed some bugs 
Compiled with latest version of libnodave 
Compiled with latest Qt version 5 and 4


Plcqtlib is a library that facilitates the connection with the Siemens plc by exploiting the network ethernet. Library function: (read the documentation included with the software.) The library works with the family plc S7-200, S71200, S7300, S7400 and Logo 0BA7. The library has been developed with the QT version 4 and 5 http://qt-project.org/ using parts of known Libnodave http://libnodave.sourceforge.net/
